name: Hachoo!
overview:
Hachoo! is an oriental themed 2D side-scrolling beat 'em-up set in China. After cracks appear in an old statue the creature residing in the statue is slowly released. You volunteer to stop the creature from fully escaping and turn it back to stone.

As you make progress you encounter numerous different enemies that protect the creature, attacking you with hand to hand moves and range attacks like throwing rocks and fire breathing. The player can defend himself by jumping and using kick and hand to hand moves. One move allows you to throw enemies at the screen. The game can be played solo or with a friend.
